item.title: My Research Interest
item.author: Author
item.description: Bioinformatics & Deep Learning Analysis and integration of biological omics data with deep learning methods. Developing new bioinformatics tools. Brain Science & Cognitive Neuroscience Mechanism of Language, Emotion, Memory, and Dream. Macroscopic phenomena and application of brain. The human brain and Artificial Intelligence. Brain Computer Interface Artificial Intelligence Theoretical Research of Deep Learning. Medical Imaging EEG, X-ray, fMRI
